short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Google Chrome extension brings screen sharing to Aura Alliance Meeting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aura Alliance Meeting allows you to easily conduct secure, reliable and cost effective meetings directly in your web browser. You can meet and collaborate with your customers, teams and partners at any time without the burden of having to travel to physical meetings.

This extension allows Google Chrome users to share their screen with all meeting participants.
